event_name: Web3 x AI Risk at Devconnect
description:
​A participatory discussion focused on exploring and critically examining emergent risks at the intersection of AI and Web3 technologies.

​Join this two-hour discussion event, Thursday, Nov 16, at the Istanbul Congress Center. Registration is required to receive the specific location and to ensure a focused environment.


​Tentative Discussion Topics

​These are suggestions of topics to discuss. We welcome relevant topics at the intersection.


​AI x Cryptography: Advanced vulnerability identification in cryptographic systems, automated cryptanalysis research, …


​AI x Cybersecurity: AI-driven cyberattacks, complex adaptive threats, exploitation of subtle vulnerabilities, scale and speed, evading detection systems, …


​AI x Web3 governance: Influence of AI integrated in governance, social engineering, sybil-resistant identity schemes, …


​AI x Privacy: Exploitation of the public datasets of ‘decentralized interactions’, facilitation of global and targeted surveillance, …


​AI x Web3 systemic risk: Cascading failure of interdependent systems, rapid and uncontrolled spread of AI technologies in decentralized networks, emergent behaviors from interaction of AI and decentralized systems, AI-driven market manipulation, …


​Decentralized AI alignment: Decentralized autonomous AI entities, ensuring these AI systems do what ‘we’ want them to do instead of doing unintended harmful behaviors, monitoring and auditing decentralized AI, social choice theory, alignment of DAO-controlled systems, …


​Uncontrollability: Humans and AI systems leveraging web3 systems for diffusion, botnet control, ransomware, …


​<Bring your own topic!>


​This Discussion Event is designed to be a participatory and dynamic discussion, where your reflections will contribute to a deeper collective understanding. :)
